content.question: Answer the following questions in English unless the question specifically asks you to write out Latin words. Number your answer to each question. 1. Translate in context the words aliquo numero atque honore . 2. What Latin word is the antecedent of quae? 3. Name one and only one of the circumstances that, according to (Plerique... nobilibus), force the common people of Gaul to become slaves. 4. Translate in context the word sese AND identify its case. 5. Identify the case of dominis. 6. In Roman society, what was a slave called after manumission?

frqParts.text: Answer the following questions in English unless the question specifically asks you to write out Latin words. Number your answer to each question. 1. Translate in context the words aliquo numero atque honore . 2. What Latin word is the antecedent of quae? 3. Name one and only one of the circumstances that, according to (Plerique... nobilibus), force the common people of Gaul to become slaves. 4. Translate in context the word sese AND identify its case. 5. Identify the case of dominis. 6. In Roman society, what was a slave called after manumission?

skill.text: 1.B: Describe how grammar contributes to the meaning and function of Latin words and phrases in context.
